name: SHOTGUN WITCH (itch)
description:
Oh no! The demons have stolen your magic book! You are left defenseless !

Only armed with a double barrel shotgun, go through waves of hell spawns to get your book back!

Art and animation by

Dementori

Programming by

Asephy

Additional art:

Jchoco

Special thanks to Peritunes for so many amazing royalty free soundtracks!

Alt+Enter to toggle fullscreen  :y
